title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When trying to create a JAR using the JAR packager, the following error occurs: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
OB: When pressing Finish on the JAR packager, the error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed
SR:
1. Open a file in the project
2. Make changes to the file without saving
3. Open the JAR packager for the project
4. Fill in all the required fields (path, destination, name of JAR packager, etc.)
5. Press Finish
